ygData.subject: Re: All Read: Important
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t remember seeing any transformer getting killed somewhere else than in the movie. It was as much a kid s show then as it is now. They got hurt like hell

I don't remember seeing any transformer getting killed somewhere else 
than in the movie. It was as much a kid's show then as it is now. They 
got hurt like hell but were A-OK at the end of the half-hour just as 
today.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> pffft. Considering the breaking transformers tended to fall apart 
but shout
> "I'm all right...really I am!" even after being reduced to a head 
that's
> kiddy.
> 
> When g1 transformers got slagged they were torn apart, pits and 
pieces of
> slagged and melted metal that looked like it hurt like savage :)
> 
> Still kiddy in a way but unlike today's standards such shots would 
be
> considered too violent for today's generation of kids. Better shield 
their
> virgin eyes... :)
> 
>
